# This file was generated by gr_modtool, a tool from the GNU Radio framework
# This file is a part of gr-timing_utils

# SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later

########################################################################
# Invoke macro to generate various sources and headers
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND timing_utils_sources
    ${generated_sources}
    add_usrp_tags_impl.cc
    uhd_timed_pdu_emitter_impl.cc
    interrupt_emitter_impl.cc
    system_time_diff_impl.cc
    system_time_tagger_impl.cc
    tag_uhd_offset_impl.cc
    thresh_trigger_f_impl.cc
    timed_freq_xlating_fir_impl.cc
    wall_clock_time_impl.cc
    time_delta_impl.cc
    timed_tag_retuner_impl.cc
    constants.cc
)

set(timing_utils_sources "${timing_utils_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT timing_utils_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT timing_utils_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-timing_utils SHARED ${timing_utils_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-timing_utils
	gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime
        gnuradio::gnuradio-filter
	gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks
	gnuradio::gnuradio-fft
        gnuradio::gnuradio-pmt
)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-timing_utils
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-timing_utils PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_timing_utils_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-timing_utils PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-timing_utils)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_timing_utils_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-timing_utils)

if(NOT test_timing_utils_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_timing_utils_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_timing_utils_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("timing_utils_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
